recipesJson.name: Creamy Hazelmond
recipesJson.author: LimeDrive
recipesJson.description: I stole the VBIC % from ID10-t's Swashbuckle Shake. I don't find CAP VBIC to be exactly like ice cream...but it's good. The marzipan really helps to connect the nuts with the creams, especially the almond. Whipped Cream adds some fluffy mouthfeel.
